meanings.definition: The act of converting physical photographs into digital images.
meanings.sent1: Photoscanning is a great way to preserve old family pictures.
meanings.sent2: I spent the afternoon photoscanning all our vacation photos.
meanings.sent3: After hours of photoscanning, I started to see pixels in my sleep!
meanings.sent4: Photoscanning is like turning memories into ones and zeros.
meanings.sent5: The photoscanning process brought new life to the old photo album.

meanings.definition: The process of scanning photographs to create digital copies.
meanings.sent1: Photoscanning can help you organize your photo collection easily.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to do photoscanning to share pictures with friends online.
meanings.sent3: My cat interrupted my photoscanning session by sitting on the scanner!
meanings.sent4: Photoscanning is like photocopying memories into the digital world.
meanings.sent5: The photoscanning service offered high-quality digital reproductions of old photos.
